title: Breaking Down 'Avengers: Endgame' | The Watch
description:
窶連vengers: Endgame' was pure entertainment (1:00). We break down the biggest flexes from the movie (6:51) where the franchise goes from here (13:18), what happened to our favorite characters (21:59), and who won the movie (40:42).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
